title: Dental Technician
description: A Dental technician who is Registered or non-registered experienced in dental laboratory.

title: Laboratory Membership
description: A Dental laboratory whose services are exclusively available to member of the dental profession.

title: Associate Membership
description: An Associate member small include a Dental laboratory supplier, a manufacturer representative or Dental Technology instructor who does not qualify for Technician Membership.

title: Student Membership
description: A Dental technician student in a Dental collage or in a institute can be registered as IDTA Member.
